author: Wayne Collins
method: Place all the ingredients, apart from the cinnamon cream, into a latt√© glass and stir to mix.  Spoon the cinnamon cream on top, garnish with nutmeg and serve.
ingredients: 25ml/1fl oz vanilla vodka,  25ml/1fl oz Galliano,  1 tsp caster sugar,  50ml/2fl oz freshly brewed coffee,  1 dessertspoon cinnamon cream (double cream whipped with cinnamon syrup) ,  grated nutmeg, to garnish
